trans-unit.target: TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_CALL_RETAINER_FAILED<tab>Your retainer did not respond.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_CALL_FAILED_NO_CHARGE<tab>The retainer managing this mannequin has been released from service. To access this mannequin, place it again and assign a new retainer.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_CHANGE_STATUS_DISABLE<tab>You must remove all gear from the mannequin before changing its settings.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_SELL_DISABLE<tab>You must remove all gear from the mannequin before you can list items for sale.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_DISPLAY_DISABLE<tab>You must remove all gear from the mannequin before you can list items to display.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q1_000_001<tab>Select an option.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A1_000_001<tab>Select gear to sell.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A1_000_008<tab>Select gear to display.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A1_000_002<tab>View sale history.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A1_000_004<tab>Assign mannequin class. (Current setting: <var 2D ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A1_000_005<tab>Select race and gender. (Current setting: <var 08 E4E80301 ((Male)) ((Female)) /var> <var 28 ((Race)) E80201 /var>)
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A1_000_006<tab>Select a pose. (Current setting: <var 28 ((HousingMerchantPose)) E80202 /var>)
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A1_000_007<tab>Quit.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q2_000_001<tab>Select a class.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A2_000_001<tab>Tank.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A2_000_002<tab>Healer.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A2_000_003<tab>DPS.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A2_000_004<tab>Disciple of the Hand.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A2_000_005<tab>Disciple of the Land.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A2_000_006<tab>Quit.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A3_000_001<tab><var 2D ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A3_000_002<tab>Quit.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q4_000_001<tab>Your mannequin's class will be changed to <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>. Proceed?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q32_000_001<tab>Select race.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A32_000_001<tab><var 28 ((Race)) E80201 /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A32_000_002<tab>Quit.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q33_001_001<tab>Select gender.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A33_001_001<tab>Male.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A33_001_002<tab>Female.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A33_001_003<tab>Quit.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q34_002_001<tab>Your mannequin will be changed to a <var 08 E4E80301 ((Male)) ((Female)) /var> <var 28 ((Race)) E80201 /var>. Proceed?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q5_000_001<tab>Select race and gender.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A5_000_001<tab>Male Miqo'te.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A5_000_002<tab>Female Miqo'te.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A5_000_003<tab>Quit.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q6_000_001<tab>Your mannequin will be changed to a <var 08 E1E80202 ((female Miqo'te)) ((male Miqo'te)) /var>. Proceed?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q7_000_001<tab>Select a pose.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A7_000_000<tab><var 28 ((HousingMerchantPose)) E80202 /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_A7_000_001<tab>Quit.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_Q8_000_001<tab>Your mannequin's pose will be changed to <var 28 ((HousingMerchantPose)) E80202 /var>. Proceed?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I have come, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Nothin' fer ye to worry about.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>You summoned?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Yes? <sigh> I hope this doesn't take long...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>You wish to see how a master handles a bazaar?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Hello, hello! You called?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>At your service, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>What's it to be this time, love?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>What would you ask?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>I'm so sorry to keep you waiting, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. So very, very sorry.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Quickly now, I've places to be.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Well, if it ain't my favorite client! Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Yes, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? What is your bidding?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What's on the agenda, chief? Deprivin' saps o' their hard-earned gil?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I have come. You may proceed.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, hello there. To what do I owe the pleasure?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I am come to conduct business, and only business.

TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You look to be in good health, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I assist you this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>What is it you would have me do, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Usually, it's me doin' the summons and others doin' the waitin'.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Is there something that I can help you with?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Oh, why must you summon me at a time like this...?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I'm sure there is a perfectly good explanation for this summons.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>You know, I thought you might be along to summon me. You may rest assured that I am ready and eager to serve.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Hail to thee, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Your humble servant has heard your summons.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Greetin's and salutations, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Pray speak yer desires, an' I'll do me damndest to see 'em done.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I was wondering when you'd get around to calling me.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Mind if we keep this brief? I've got a pretty little thing that's waitin' for me.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>What?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm here, I'm here!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Here I am, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>, as per your request.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>'Ello, dearie. What's on the docket?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>I never miss a chance to line these pockets.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Well, this is unexpected! What'll it be?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>What is it now?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Here I aaaaaam!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>How may I be of serrrvice, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>It's a war out there, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You have no idea.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Business or pleasure?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I presume you did not summon me solely for the pleasure of my company.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Just the <var 08 E905 ((fair maiden)) ((handsome fellow)) /var> I was hoping to see! Tell me your heart's desire.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I hope your catcall is not one of disapproval.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>A cat's ears do not miss much―least of all a summons.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Curiosity called the cat. What do you have for me today?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ready when you are.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I was just thinking of you!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>What need have you of me today, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! Ye got work needs gettin' done? Just point me in the right bloody direction.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I've come. What is it?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Hey there─hic─<var 08 E905 ((missy)) ((mate)) /var>! Care to join me fer a pint?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Couldn't come no quicker. Where's the work?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I came runnin' soon as I heard the bell! Ye need somethin', chief?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I am at your disposal, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Ye got somethin' fer me, cap'n?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Go ahead, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Let's keep this short and sweet, shall we?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>This wouldn't be necessary if you entrusted your financial affairs to me.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>So─sellin', buyin', drinkin', whorin'? What's it to be today?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I be of service?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What'll it be, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>State your business.

TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>And how does this wonderful <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> find you?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Well... Here I am...<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>We work the market stalls,♪ And our uniforms are pretty;♪ We are sober men and true,♪ And attentive to our duties!♪
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab><var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var>. What would you ask of me?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>So. We doing this?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Yes?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Hey, it's...it's you! Hello again, you!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I-It's not like I want to sell your items or anything.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>What do you have for me? Come on, come on! Don't be shy!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>You rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>I trust this will be worth my while.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>What<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Whatever you need, leave it to me! I have my methods.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Gahaha! If it isn't my favorite <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var>!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>It is I, your most loyal and capable retainer!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>What will it be, love?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Your orders! I would hear them at once!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>If there is something you would ask of me, then ask it.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Yes...? Is there something you─<yawn>─need?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>A task for me? I hope it's something fun!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>I am here to do your every bidding, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Ask of me anything at all!

TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I have been awaiting your summons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. What would you have of me this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>What can I do for ye, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>You called, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>You─hic─rang?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Need my assistance, do you? Let's make this quick, then.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>You have my ear, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Both of them, in fact!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>You summoned me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>At your beck an' call, I am!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>You called, and I have come.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>At last─I thought you'd <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> call. What does <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var> need of me?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Could it be...? The famous <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has called on <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? <chuckle>
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_ENTER_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Yes, yes, here I am! Ready at a moment's notice!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If that is all, I will take my leave now, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Take care o' yerself, hear?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Until we next meet.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Well, it's about time. Good-bye.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I believe thanks are in order.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm off, then!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>With your leave, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Don't you worry 'bout a thing. I got this.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Farewell, then.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>If there is nothing else, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I'll be going now.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Is that all? Very well, until next time.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Oh, will that be all today? Very well, but promise me you'll come back soon!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>As always, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, it has been an honor and a privilege.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>You can count on me, chief─I know how to get things done.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Don't be a stranger.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I swear it shall be done. Eventually.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>As you wish.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Capital! I shall carry out your orders forthwith.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I humbly await your next summons, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Don't leave me alone for too long, hear?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Always a pleasure.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>That will be all, yes? Then if you would excuse me...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>I believe that concludes our dealings for now.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Are you certain you don't desire anything else? Anything at all? Very well, I shall take my leave.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Your every whim shall be swiftly carried out with due care and consideration.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Shouldn't take more than a moment, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I'll be going, then.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Thank the gods we're finished. I've got plans to put my hands in places I've never seen...if you know what I mean.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Be well.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>I'm off, I'm off!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Until we meet again!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Blessin's o' the Twelve upon ye.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>May Nald'thal see fit to fatten our pockets!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Your wish is my command, and so forth.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You know how to reach me.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Is it time for good-byes already? I'm going to miss you...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Thy will be done.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>The markets may be a bleedin' battlefield, but I'm a godsdamned soldier. You can count on me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Why so serrrious? <sigh> So it goes.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I hardly think that warranted my personal appearance, but what is done is done.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Then I have satisfied your every need? Excellent! I do so take pleasure in servicing my clients.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Good-bye for now, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Right then, let's get on with it!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>There is no call for concerrrn.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>When the master's away, the cat will play.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Gods, this is tirin'...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>You don't want to be with me anymore? <sniffle>
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>I shall carry out your wishes as instructed, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Bwahahaha! I'm in yer bazaar, sellin' yer wares!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>I will go now.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Awww, bugger. Reckon I best get to work...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>I don't do good-byes.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Go and grab yourself some shut-eye, chief. You look terrible!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Will that be all for today, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>? Understood.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Aye, aye, cap'n!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Duly noted.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Not exactly how I was hopin' to spend my day, but I suppose it can't be helped.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Ours is not to reason why. Ours is but to do and die.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Ever the consummate professional, I see. Another time, then.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>If there is nothing else, then I shall take my leave.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Is that all? Guess I'll be on my way, then.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>Any last requests? Very well. Heh heh heh... Ahem.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>Ah, yes, of course. Duty calls!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>You are finished with me, then?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Here today and gone tomorrow;♪ Yes, I know─♪ That is so!♪
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>If ever you have need of me, just ring.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Right, then.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>Finished already? Guess that's that, then.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>You're leaving already? Fine, then! I-It's not like I wanted you to stay or anything.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Very good indeed!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Always a pleasure to serve, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Hmph. I hope that next time you will have a more meaningful task for me.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Good-bye<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>And with that, I shall be off. Places to go, people to see.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>Bahahaha! Till next time, my friend!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Ring for me whenever you please! You know that I will never let you down!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>Must we part so soon?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>And I am off!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>Call on me as you please. If I am so inclined, I will answer.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>That is all, I suppose...? <yawn> Very well...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>That is all? Oh, I was hoping there'd be more...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Is that all you need of me? But I could yet serve you in so many ways!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>Do not hesitate to call upon me again. Fare you well in your endeavors, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>Just say the word, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>, and I'll be here with bells on.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>If you have no further need of my services...
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>I'm off for another glass, then. You know where to find me!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>What─is that it? Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> you need a retainer?
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>Nothing else? Then I shall be hopping along.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>I'm glad to have been of service. Mind you don't overdo things, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>Had your fill of me, eh? Fair enough! Let me know if you need aught else!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>We're done? Then I take my leave.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>There's naught else <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var> requires? I'll be sharpening my claws, then, waiting for your next summons.
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>Nothing else? Right... I'll be off!
TEXT_HOUFURMERCHANT_00511_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>Have everything you need? I'll take a little nap, then.
